title: Having Targeted Goals in Open Source with Diana Chen
description: At erxes, weâ€™re dedicated to supporting open source projects grow. We do this in a couple of different ways. Secondly, we work hard to educate open source project founders and contributors on a wide range of topics relating to marketing open source projects.
